'''2.4.104''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher|launcher]] released on June 6, 2023.

== Changes ==
* Updates for new Java/Bedrock game version release, including soothing scene videos on Java/Bedrock game pages.
* New Launcher icon release!
* Improvements to Java game installation reliability.

== Fixes ==
* Fixes to Mac loading workflow.
* {{bug|MCL-23407}} - New installation icon selection not consistent with new textures.
